title: Candy Bubble

controls: Mouse: Move the cursor to aim, and left-click to shoot.

content.howToPlay: Shoot bubbles and match three or more of the same color to clear them.The bigger the cluster you pop, the more points you earn!Aim for large clusters to clear more bubbles in one go. and use the walls to bounce bubbles off the edges to reach tricky spots.You have limited number of bubbles to clear all the bubbles and complete the level. Check how many are left on the left side of your screen.Watch for the next bubble at the bottom. Tap on the bubble shooter to change the bubble's color with the next one.Earn three stars by completing levels quickly with fewer shots.
